title: Native pollinators often best for native crops

content.question: In North America, native pollinators often increase the quantity and quality of crops of native plants that are insect pollinated more effectively than European honeybees do. The most likely reason for the phenomenon is that native pollinators

choices.label: are uniformly smaller than European honeybees
have coevolved with native plant species

content.answer: have coevolved with native plant species

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
